title: This Week's Livestreamed Accelerator Talks
content: Our fall accelerator is in full swing, which means we have great speakers coming in every week to teach our startups about marketing, distribution, design, and more! 3 of our talks this week will be livestreamed, so check them out below: The Hockey Stick Myth: The Truth About Growth via Email, SEO, & App Stores When: 11/5 at 12PM, PST https://new.livestream.com/500SAcc/HockeyStick The Nuts and Bolts of Building a Customer-Driven Company When: 11/6 at 12PM, PST https://new.livestream.com/500SAcc/customerlove Uncool Marketing Channels that Work for Startups When: 11/7 at 12PM, PST https://new.livestream.com/500SAcc/UnCoolMarketing All of these sessions will have Q&A, so if you have questions, feel free to ask them in the livestream chatroom.
